front.title: IANA Registry for Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE) Options

abstract.t: It has been identified that "Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE): A Protocol for Network Address Translator (NAT) Traversal for Offer/Answer Protocols" (RFC 5245) is missing a registry for ICE options. This document defines this missing IANA registry and updates RFC 5245. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
